text: The registration process is painful as you can't re-send the registration email via workflow and has to be sent manually. I've been patiently waiting for resolution to the registration challenge. Don't get me wrong, I love the new membership feature. It's awesome and opens the door for some pretty cool stuff. However, HubSpot delivered us a brand new "Mercedes" and forgot to give us the keys or put gas in the tank! <@U02MK065QB1>, do me a favor and go upvote this idea in the community. *<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Send-Membership-registration-email-via-workflow/idi-p/440036>*

Yup, that is a very much needed feature.
Also, redirecting to the set password page from the signup page is also a very needed feature.

I have upvoted your idea, and I wish HubSpot team take notice of that.
